name: The 4th Annual Conference on Engineering and Information Technology
content: Annual Conference on Engineering and Information Technology (ACEAIT) will be held from March 29 to 31, 2016 in Kyoto, Japan. It was first held in June, 2013 in Seoul, the second in March 2014 in Tokyo and the third in March 2015 in Osaka. ACEAIT aims at providing a platform for researchers, engineers, academics and industrial professionals to present their recent research work and to explore future trends in various areas of engineering and information technology.
